title: Word That Accurately Describes What This Role Does

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the beginning of the game, choose a word that's not already the name of a role. The host will come up with a role that is accurately described by that word. It can't have mechanics that aren't seen on any other roles. You become that role.

desc:
Post 305
*God! Wait, no, okay, uh, godddddess?*
